name: modelwhale-mcp-test
description: 这是一个模型上下文协议 (MCP) 服务器，用于提供ModelWhale信息。支持两种传输方式：stdio 和 SSE (Server-Sent Events)，通过环境变量控制。
author: joy-yu

scripts.start:stdio: npm run build && TRANSPORT_MODE=stdio node build/index.js
scripts.start:sse: npm run build && TRANSPORT_MODE=sse node build/index.js
scripts.start:streamable: npm run build && TRANSPORT_MODE=streamable-http node build/index.js
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run build:watch" "nodemon --delay 1000ms build/index.js" "npm run debug"
scripts.dev:stdio: concurrently "npm run build:watch" "TRANSPORT_MODE=stdio nodemon --delay 1000ms build/index.js" "npm run debug"
scripts.dev:sse: concurrently "npm run build:watch" "TRANSPORT_MODE=sse nodemon --delay 1000ms build/index.js" "npm run debug"
scripts.dev:streamable: concurrently "npm run build:watch" "TRANSPORT_MODE=streamable-http nodemon --delay 1000ms build/index.js" "npm run debug"
